text: The 2011 San Marino and Rimini's Coast motorcycle Grand Prix was the thirteenth round of the 2011 Grand Prix motorcycle racing season. It took place on the weekend of 2–4 September 2011 at the Misano World Circuit. ==MotoGP classification== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" ! Pos. ! No. ! Rider ! Team ! Manufacturer !
